data.description: Plot projections of 3D functions with Imager
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
As an add-on to the Math::Project3D module, this module allows
    plotting projections created using the Math::Project3D module and
    Imager.

    Because it's specifically geared towards use with the module in the
    parent namespace, Math::Project3D::Plot should not go into a totally
    unrelated namespace. Hence I just appended the '::Plot'.
